metadata.title: CVE-2024-26648 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Fix variable deferencing before NULL check inedp_setup_replay()In edp_setup_replay(), 'struct dc *dc' & 'struct dmub_replay *replay'was dereferenced before the pointer 'link' & 'replay' NULL check.Fixes the below:drivers/gpu/drm/amd/amdgpu/../display/dc/link/protocols/link_edp_panel_control.c:947edp_setup_replay() warn: variable dereferenced before check 'link' (seeline 933)

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
